messages: Ah, liquid regret. Exactly how I prefer my beverages to taste.
Hmm... Can I still drink this? Lemme give this a shot.
Drat! No body, no stomach, no taste!
Brad: Huh? Did that glass fall over by itself?
Nina: Nooooo! My only escape from reality! How will I find the strength to go on?
Brad: Sorry, I couldn't help but overhear.
Nina: Brad? What are you doing here?
Brad: Drowning your sorrows in alcohol isn't a very good coping mechanism. I don't think your Alan would want to see you like this.
Brad: C'mon. Staying here isn't helping anyone. Let's go somewhere else.
Nothing happens. Brad and Nina pass each other without a single glance.
Little did I know that my inaction would cause them to never see each other again.
